name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-oriented Back End Engineer with 8 years of experience in software engineering and design, specializing in building secure, scalable solutions using **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and **Micronaut** frameworks. Proficient in containerization with **Docker** and orchestration using **Kubernetes**, ensuring seamless deployment and management of applications in cloud environments like **AWS**. Solid understanding of message-driven architectures and event sourcing principles, enabling enhanced data processing and integration.
I am committed to implementing robust security practices and leveraging data-driven insights to optimize performance. My background includes developing high-performance applications in the healthcare and financial sectors while complying with industry standards. Additionally, I possess hands-on experience with **Kafka** for real-time data processing and am skilled in database design and architecture for efficient data management.
